text: Richard John Hall (6 June 1872 – 15 December 1906) was an Australian rules footballer who played with Collingwood in the Victorian Football League (VFL). == External links == * *Dick Hall's profile at Collingwood Forever Category:1872 births Category:1906 deaths Category:Australian rules footballers from Victoria (Australia) Category:Collingwood Football Club players
title: Dick Hall (Australian footballer)
